review: Just got my Fire TV stick and I love it. Super user friendly and I've had no problems!
author: Jordan

review: Great, affordable device for streaming through HDMI
author: Primetime4x4

review: It won't stay connected to my wifi. I have a good signal and all my other devices stay connected. This one just won't work. I will be returning it since I can't use it.
author: Bev Rdz

review: This is great. I am saving 200.00 a month on my cable bill by using the the fire stick. If you want to lower your cable bill I strongly recommend this product.
author: Ralph Boutwell

review: This product is literally a joke. If you got 40 bucks to burn try using it more than 10 feet from wifi and see how funny it is. Amazon should be sued for selling this product. They're customer 'support' will not work with me or answer my questions. All I know is.. if you don't have some world class wifi, you ain't watching nothing. BE WARE
author: Christopher Mason

review: Love it!  Brings us hours and hours of entertainment.
author: Millie S. Wilson

review: I didn't realize it had to be plugged in to operate. I wouldn't have purchased it had I known that.
author: Greg Murphy

review: Easy to setup and use.  Worked right out of the box.  I like the content on Amazon prime.
author: Jim Para

review: Super easy to setup. Good pricing too.
author: Blue Daisy
